svg:

new cardnew cardnew cardTeam CardTeam CardTeam CardTeam CardTeam CardAlpha CrowTurn #Drafting ScreenDuring the Drafting Phase, the player selectsa crow and drags it to his desired team position.There are 5 positions, 3 front and 2 back.Once a player chooses a card, a new set is given.This continues until all draws are done, which movesto the next turn and moving the season cycle.Each season has 3 turns. Each turn has 2 draws.Sun Emoji, 2 turns to Spring EmojiDraws Remaining: 2
